content.raw:
I just tested this out and it works great. Not setting the seed → random seed → random wind. Setting the seed works well too. I tested out the world creation with the new yamls and it worked as well. Looks good to me. 

Feel free to sync \(maybe add to Changelog\) and merge.
content.html:
I just tested this out and it works great. Not setting the seed → random seed → random wind. Setting the seed works well too. I tested out the world creation with the new yamls and it worked as well. Looks good to me.

Feel free to sync (maybe add to Changelog) and merge.
